properties.description: We cater for everyone, including the elderly. We are a multicultural space and have some free and easy exercises available. We provide a warm drink an sometimes warm soup and rolls.

properties.description: Warwickshire Libraries, offer a comfortable safe environment for everyone to use and our free services will help to keep some of your costs down. You don’t need to be a library member to visit – just pop in. Choose to spend time reading, studying, working and using free library WiFi; tackle a jigsaw, play a board game, become absorbed in mindfulness colouring or join in our free library events and activities for all ages to make friends or learn something new. https://www.warwickshire.gov.uk/directory-record/586/rugby-library-and-information-centre

properties.description: The church cafe is open for visitors from 10am-midday (Tuesday to Saturday) for a warm drink, a friendly chat, or simply to have a look at some of the building’s history. We'd love to welcome you!

Multiple events – all FREE drop-ins, no need to book. Refreshments included.

Living Room in the Library – Mondays 10am-12noon – company, games & puzzles, craft materials, free Wi-Fi and occasional talks and workshops

Yarn Crafters – Tuesdays 1.15-3.15pm – Bring your own yarn-based project or help with ours

Chess Mates – Thursdays 1.15-3.15pm – Stop by for a friendly game of chess

properties.address: Cawston Community Hall, Scholars Drive, Cawston, CV22 7GU
properties.description:
Coffee Morning. Entrance is free! £2 for a hot drink (or squash) and a biscuit and this includes a free refill. Everyone is welcome – we encourage a broad spectrum of people and provide a children’s corner. Most sessions will have music or a raffle or both! The Police and local authority representatives are often present so visitors can can chat them informally in a relaxed setting. Any profit made on the day goes towards a nominated charity.

This information is provided by a community group so it is advisable to check opening times with them directly, particularly over holiday periods.
properties.title: Cawston Community Hall Hub

properties.description: 10.15-12.45 Sunday weekly services.
